Title: Prevents gas and electric companies from expanding transmission lines or electric generating facilities for lines and facilities originating outside of New York
Summary: Prevents gas and electric companies from expanding transmission lines or electric generating facilities for lines and facilities originating outside of New York.
LawCode: Amd ยง11, Transp Corps L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the transportation corporations law, in relation to the powers of gas and electric corporations
